description: A tattoo inked into your skin. The magical ink used responds to the geometry it is put into, and actually enchants the inked's body with an aspect. This is the first part of the rune of longevity, and so increases the amount of hp you have by 5 percent. Having the entire set is sure to produce a more substantial effect.
